description.value: You have embarked on a dedicated journey to hone not just your skills to perfection, but your body as well. By cultivating your own physical prowess, you know that you can count on your body to perform when the situation tests your physical limits.

system.classDetails:
Standalone Archetype: Athlete

Unlock: When you reach 2nd level overall and have at least one level in a Martial class.

Class Features at Higher Levels

Class Categorization: Martial
Rest Dice Gain After 1st Level: 1d12 per Athlete level
Hit Point Gain After 1st Level:
- 1d12 + your Constitution modifier
- Or 7 + your Constitution modifier
Mana: None

🆓 Given Abilities: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.VXLO74M9FQ5TRHU8]{Athletic}

Athlete Abilities

When taking a level in Athlete, you may choose from the following abilities:

Options: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.GOP7M90B2MXBCL8K]{Sprinter}, @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.17YBBWEXS5QW6W94]{Stalwart Physique}, @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.KHXTYYWW0CRFP2RN]{Going All-Out}, @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.MCOVKJ7UZMJQGXIQ]{Tireless}
